jenkins.plugins.parameter__separator.Par.name: separator-43cc847e-565d-4a20-bc37-6bd3ba53f21c
jenkins.plugins.parameter__separator.Par.sectionHeader: Input Robot Framework output directory, test data directory, and test data file name.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OutputDir
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Relative directory to the workspace. The directory contains the Robot Framework output files: log.html, report.html, output.xml, xunit.xml.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TestDataDir
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Relative directory to the workspace. The directory contains test data files.

jenkins.plugins.parameter__separator.Par.name: separator-4f7d16fd-6f28-4466-bd84-fb916b33633d
jenkins.plugins.parameter__separator.Par.sectionHeader: TestSuites/TestCases: Select test suites and test cases Please use TestCaseRunFilter1 or TestCaseRunFilter2 to select test cases to run.

org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.name: TestCaseRunFilter1
org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.description: Select which test cases to run if TestCaseRunFilter1 is not used.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TestCaseRunFilter2
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is to filter which test cases will be run. The entire test suite will be run if the value is empty. -t, --test <name> `Selects the test cases by name`_. -i, --include <tag> `Includes the test cases`_ by tag. -e, --exclude <tag> `Excludes the test cases`_ by tag.

jenkins.plugins.parameter__separator.Par.name: separator-c90d049e-f1be-4a5c-b20d-b6dae3dea5cc
jenkins.plugins.parameter__separator.Par.sectionHeader: Etrack Release / Cycle: Auto update Etrack test case status Choose "Retrieve Etrack Version and select Etrack Version / Cycle / Folder from download list.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
IF "%TestSuiteName%." == "." GOTO LabelNoSuites
echo Go to the Robot Framework directory cd %WORKSPACE% del /q %OutputDir%\%TestSuiteName%_*.xml del /q %OutputDir%\%TestSuiteName%_*.html del /q %OutputDir%\Screenshots\*%TestSuiteName%*.png FOR /d /r . %%d IN ("%OutputDir%\Output\*%TestSuiteName%*") DO @IF EXIST "%%d" rd /s /q "%%d"
if "%TestCaseRunFilter1%" == "" (set "TestCaseRunFilter=%TestCaseRunFilter2%") else (set "TestCaseRunFilter=-t %TestCaseRunFilter1:,= -t %")
echo Start Robot Framework automation robot %TestCaseRunFilter% --outputdir %OutputDir% --log %TestSuiteName%_log.html --output %TestSuiteName%_output.xml --report %TestSuiteName%_report.html --variablefile %TestDataDir%/%TestDataFileName%.py ECOManageRobotProject/TestSuite_ECOManage/TestSuite_%TestSuiteName%.robot
:LabelNoSuites echo No TestSuite was selected!
echo Completed!

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
ECO Robot Framework Automation Result

$PROJECT_NAME - ${TestSuiteName} - Build # $BUILD_NUMBER - $BUILD_STATUS

Check console output at $BUILD_URL to view the results.

Robot Framework Report

Failed Test Cases:

${ROBOT_FAILEDCASES}
